context_of_use: This use case allows admins to manage the product catalog, including inventory levels and pricing.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control product availability and pricing
description: This use case enables admins to create and maintain the product catalog, ensuring accurate inventory levels and pricing.
preconditions: Admin is authenticated and logged into the system.
postconditions: Product catalog is updated with new products, prices, and inventory levels.
assumptions: Admin has the necessary permissions to manage products.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to create new products.
The system shall allow admins to update product prices.
The system shall allow admins to manage inventory levels.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the specific fields required for product creation and updates.
main_flow: 1. Admin initiates authentication → System verifies admin credentials.
2. Admin creates a new product → System adds the product to the catalog.
3. Admin updates product prices → System updates the pricing information.
4. Admin manages inventory levels → System adjusts inventory accordingly.
